response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and potential impact, I estimate its value to be well above $12,000. To ensure we both achieve a mutually beneficial outcome, I am offering this exceptional product to you for $15,000. This price reflects not only the cost of development and production but also the potential long-term benefits it can bring to you. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 15000}
